page.title: 19OUR FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: On Saturday morning I usually get up, dressed, watch T.V. for 30 minutes then go outside if it's dry while my Mum bakes scones, pancakes and cakes.Sometimes I go to town with my sister, Gillian, and my Mum. If not I play on my tree swing or my bike. If I go to town I usually meet Janette and then wait at the tax office for my Mum. My dad works on the farm but stops for a while to have a sleep and some dinner - that's from about 11am to 3pm - or he works in his home-made greenhouse. If it is Dad's weekend off we usually go to Brickrow to see my Uncle and Aunty and get home in the early hours of Sunday morning. In the afternoon we go to Soleburn Nurseries, then on to Moreen's for our dinner. Sunday night, regularly, Moreen and Drew come up. Some weekends we go to Portpatrick and have high tea at the
